      • setAccepted

        public void setAccepted(boolean accepted)
        Set this State as accepted

      • isAccepted

        public boolean isAccepted()
        Returns:
        True if this State is accepted, else otherwise

      • addTransition

        public void addTransition(I input,
                 java.lang.String targetState,
                 O output)
        Adds a new Transition to the List of Transitions of this State. If there already is a Transition that would react to the given input, the Transition for that input will be overwritten.

      • getTransition

        public Transition<O> getTransition(I input)
        Returns:
        The Transition that would be performed with the given input or null if there is no Transition for that input

      • transit

        public O transit(I input)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Performs a Transition based on the given input. This also sets the current State of this states machine to the new value.
        Returns:
        The Output of the Transition
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If there is no Transition for the given Input

      • getMachine

        public AbstractFiniteStateMachine<I,O> getMachine()
        Returns:
        This states machine

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of this state

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The name of this state
